name: Deploy WAR over SSH
description: Deploy WAR File to Tomcat over SSH 1.0.6
helpMarkDown: Deploys a WAR file to a linux-based Apache Tomcat instance using SSH.  Requires use of the *Install SSH Key* task to authenticate.
author: Nebraska OCIO (tom_mclaughlin@qat.com)

inputs.name: SshUrl
inputs.label: SSH Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target SSH Host, with username `username@192.168.1.1`.  If using hostnames, be sure that the hostname is in DNS so that the agent machine can resolve it.  Use the *Install SSH Key* Task on this Agent Phase to authenticate.

inputs.name: CatalinaHome
inputs.label: CATALINA_HOME
inputs.helpMarkDown: CATALINA_HOME location on remote server, e.g. `/usr/local/containers/mytomcat-8.5.0`.  This should contain the `bin` and `logs` directories.

inputs.name: WarFile
inputs.label: WAR File
inputs.helpMarkDown: WAR File to deploy, e.g. `my-app-3.0.0-SNAPSHOT.war`.  You may use PowerShell Globs here if (and only if) the glob matches a single file, e.g. `myartifact/drop/my-app*.war` or `myartifact/*/my-app*.war`.  If blank, working directory will be searched recursively for a WAR file.  Minimatch and globstar are *not* supported.

inputs.name: TargetFilename
inputs.label: Target Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filename to use in target webappsdir, e.g my-app.war.  If blank, the orignal War File name will be retained.

inputs.name: Timeout
inputs.label: Timeout (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of seconds to tail catalina.out in search of Success String.

inputs.name: SuccessString
inputs.label: Success String
inputs.helpMarkDown: If present, catalina.out will be monitored for this string.  If it is not found within Timeout seconds, the task will fail.  If left blank, catalina.out will be tailed for `Timeout` seconds before completing.
